body_html: Reading caffe2/caffe2#2439 (comment), It sounds like there is an intention to migrate the backend of pytorch to Caffe2. Am I reading that correctly? If so, what is happening to the torch backend? Are there any plans for maintaining the C-API or extern-ing the C++ interface for anyone who is trying to access the ATen backend through FFI calls?
body_text: Reading caffe2/caffe2#2439 (comment), It sounds like there is an intention to migrate the backend of pytorch to Caffe2. Am I reading that correctly? If so, what is happening to the torch backend? Are there any plans for maintaining the C-API or extern-ing the C++ interface for anyone who is trying to access the ATen backend through FFI calls?
body: Reading https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/issues/2439#issuecomment-376370807, It sounds like there is an intention to migrate the backend of pytorch to Caffe2. Am I reading that correctly? If so, what is happening to the torch backend? Are there any plans for maintaining the C-API or extern-ing the C++ interface for anyone who is trying to access the ATen backend through FFI calls?
